co.cask.cdap.api.service

Interface TxRunnable

  • Deprecated. 
    As of version 2.8.0, replaced by TxRunnable

    @Deprecated
public interface TxRunnable
    A runnable that provides a DatasetContext to programs which may be used to get access to and use datasets.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(DatasetContext context)
      Deprecated. 
      Provides a DatasetContext to get instances of Datasets.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(DatasetContext context)
         throws Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Provides a DatasetContext to get instances of Datasets.

        Operations executed on a dataset within the execution of this method are committed as a single transaction. The transaction is started before this method is invoked and is committed upon successful execution. Exceptions thrown while committing the transaction or thrown by user-code result in a rollback of the transaction.

        Parameters:
        context - to get datasets from.
        Throws:
        Exception
